abstract: Shareholder groups have urged enterprises like Sotheby’s and BSkyB to remove James Murdoch from their boards, citing his handling of News Corporation’s phone hacking scandal in Britain.
snippet: Shareholder groups have urged enterprises like Sotheby’s and BSkyB to remove James Murdoch from their boards, citing his handling of News Corporation’s phone hacking scandal in Britain.
lead_paragraph: 5:46 p.m. | Updated The problems at News Corporation could eventually affect other companies — in industries ranging from art to health care to baseball.

headline.main: Investment Groups Prod Other Companies on James Murdoch’s Board Membership
